程序包 org.apache.giraph.worker

Package of all the worker related things

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    WorkerAggregatorUsage
    Vertex classes can access and change aggregators through this interface
    WorkerObserver
    Observer for Worker
    WorkerThreadAggregatorUsage
    WorkerAggregatorUsage which can be used in each of the computation threads.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BspServiceWorker<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    ZooKeeper-based implementation of CentralizedServiceWorker.
    DefaultWorkerContext
    A dummy implementation of WorkerContext.
    DefaultWorkerObserver
    Default Observer for Worker that does nothing.
    EdgeInputSplitsCallable<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Load as many edge input splits as possible.
    EdgeInputSplitsCallableFactory<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Factory for EdgeInputSplitsCallables.
    InputSplitPathOrganizer
    Utility class to extract the list of InputSplits from the ZooKeeper tree of "claimable splits" the master created, and to sort the list to favor local data blocks.
    InputSplitsCallable<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Abstract base class for loading vertex/edge input splits.
    InputSplitsHandler
    Stores the list of input split paths, and provides thread-safe way for reserving input splits.
    VertexInputSplitsCallable<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Load as many vertex input splits as possible.
    VertexInputSplitsCallableFactory<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Factory for VertexInputSplitsCallables.
    WorkerAggregatorHandler
    Handler for aggregators on worker.
    WorkerContext
    WorkerContext allows for the execution of user code on a per-worker basis.
    WorkerInfo
    Information about a worker that is sent to the master and other workers.
